title: Expansion Plan
description: Modify an existing table structure by adding a new column using ALTER TABLE.
story: The citizens table needs to track email addresses now. Add a new column called 'email' of type VARCHAR(100) to the existing citizens table.
hint: ALTER TABLE citizens ADD COLUMN email VARCHAR(100);
tableSetup: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS citizens CASCADE;
CREATE TABLE citizens (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(100), age INT, district VARCHAR(50));
